name: Labyrinth of the Phantom
description:
You have been thrown into the Labyrinth of the Phantom! A vicious spectre haunts this place, and will do everything in its power to hunt you down and destroy you. You have only one hope of escape - find the red key on each floor of the dungeon and use it to ascend to the next - only if you can escape all 5 floors will you taste sweet freedom!

To play, extract the zip archive and run PhantomLab.exe.

A resultion of at least 1080p is required to display the game correctly, but it should still be playable in lower resolutions.

Although care has been taken to remove bugs, some may remain. If you find any, or have any other feedback, feel free to email spookyhalloumigames@gmail.com
